welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tauranga, a charming city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant arts scene, and delicious local produce. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring all that Tauranga has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tauranga Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Tauranga Airport serves flights to and from smaller cities in New Zealand.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotorua Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Rotorua Airport serves flights to and from smaller regional destinations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
